parameterConfig.description: Name of the integration chart which will be used for the Initial install
parameterConfig.name: INT_CHART_NAME

parameterConfig.description: Version of the Integration Chart which will be used for the Initial Install
parameterConfig.name: INT_CHART_VERSION

parameterConfig.description: Repo of the Integration Chart which will be used for the Initial Install
parameterConfig.name: INT_CHART_REPO

parameterConfig.description: Label to choose which Jenkins slave to execute Jenkinsfiles against
parameterConfig.name: SLAVE_LABEL

parameterConfig.description: Functional user for logging into armdocker
parameterConfig.name: FUNCTIONAL_USER_SECRET

parameterConfig.description: Gerrit refspec of the eo-gr-testing repository
parameterConfig.name: GERRIT_REFSPEC

parameterConfig.description: Provide active site environment name. Any new envierment should be added to https://gerrit.ericsson.se/plugins/gitiles/OSS/EO-Parent/com.ericsson.oss.orchestration.eo.testware/eo-gr-testing/+/master/config/envs/
parameterConfig.label: ACTIVE_ENVIRONMENT
parameterConfig.name: ACTIVE_ENVIRONMENT

parameterConfig.description: Provide standby site environment name. Any new envierment should be added to https://gerrit.ericsson.se/plugins/gitiles/OSS/EO-Parent/com.ericsson.oss.orchestration.eo.testware/eo-gr-testing/+/master/config/envs/
parameterConfig.label: STANDBY_ENVIRONMENT
parameterConfig.name: STANDBY_ENVIRONMENT

parameterConfig.description: Pretty test logs for CVNFM, VMVNFM phases
parameterConfig.label: PRETTY_API_LOGS
parameterConfig.name: PRETTY_API_LOGS

parameterConfig.description: Set "true" to skip the test execution after the environment re-installation
parameterConfig.label: SKIP_TESTS
parameterConfig.name: SKIP_TESTS

parameterConfig.description: This is the directory within the Repo specified within the Gather-Env-Details Jenkins job where to find the pooling environment details
parameterConfig.label: ENV_DETAILS_DIR
parameterConfig.name: ENV_DETAILS_DIR

parameterConfig.description: This is the label to search for that is attached to the environments in the Lockable Resource Plugin on Jenkins
parameterConfig.label: ENV_LABEL_SITE_A
parameterConfig.name: ENV_LABEL_SITE_A

parameterConfig.description: This is the label to search for that is attached to the environments in the Lockable Resource Plugin on Jenkins
parameterConfig.label: ENV_LABEL_SITE_B
parameterConfig.name: ENV_LABEL_SITE_B

parameterConfig.description: Tags used to select which EO apps to install for II
parameterConfig.label: TAGS
parameterConfig.name: TAGS

parameterConfig.description: Update superuser password on both sites
parameterConfig.label: CREATE_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD
parameterConfig.name: CREATE_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD
